newsitem.title: USA: Mills Corp Q4 shr $0.05 vs $0.20.
newsitem.headline: Mills Corp Q4 shr $0.05 vs $0.20.

text.p: Three Months Ended Twelve Months Ended

NOTE: Included in net income for the year ended December 31, 1996 was an extraordinary loss of $5.3 million ($2.7 million net of minority interest) relating to non-cash write-offs of deferred financing costs resulting from refinancings that occurred during the first and fourth quarters of 1996.

The decline in net income for the quarter ended December 31, 1996 was primarily attributable to the extraordinary loss of $4.3 million ($2.2 million net of minority interest) relating to the non-cash write-off of deferred financing costs associated with the fourth quarter 1996 refinancing of Potomac and Gurnee Mills.
